summary: Fresh out of the cave, already wearing Triss Armor
descriptionHtml:
Kelli - A level 1 Breton fresh out of the cave.

This character took me a several weeks to make... only because I was trying my hardest to find a way to get the red color of hair that I wanted.  I was so happy when I finally found a way (non mod) that I had to share it.

Several mods in effect here (listed below)... I recommend you download and install them, however, I think the hair color will transfer no matter what mods you have installed.  I have included save files with two shades... I realize the screenshot of the darker red looks brownish, but it is redder in the game.  I thought it might be my game settings so I included the bright red version too.

This is the method for getting the red hair and a few other saturated colors:
http://www.gameskyrim.com/true-red-hair-t163651.html  <scroll down the forum til you find the instructions, kudos to forum user Rhysa Hughes for that lovely workaround using PC console commands)

Mods:
No More Blocky Faces by Xenius
Better_Females by Bella
Covereyes by MrLenski
Coolsim Hair Pack by newermind43
Coolsims Hair Retexture (wild version) by Bloodysunday  (3 versions, all nice)
Triss Armor Retextured (Dark Brown version) by Psyche23 (based off original mod by Fraper)
author: trixterpriest
